issue.title: [Rust] Update version to 0.12.0 and update release instructions on wiki
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3885](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3885). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Rust version of Arrow still has version 0.10.0 in the Cargo.toml ... we need to bump this to 0.12.0 (or 0.12.0-alpha maybe) and update the instructions for releasing Arrow so that this version gets updated when performing a release.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3885?focusedCommentId=16714259) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3096
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3096>
